title: Ticket #5026: Report my forward and reverse DNS on startup
description:
Request from Brian B: When a daemon starts up, in the log report the forward resolution for our name and reverse resolution for our "primary" IPv4 and IPv6 addresses. This can be useful for debugging host base security issues.

reset_local_hostname in /src/condor/utils/ipv6_hostname.cpp around line 217 seems like the right spot.
